A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too many negatives to make this a great Star Wars movie.  Needless subplot involving Finn\, terrible comedy moments\, Domhal Gleeson reduced to a panto villain\, pointless cameos from beloved original trilogy\, Porgs existed for toy sales only\, and character set ups from the Force Awakens go nowhere.\n\nVery sad for me to be saying this.
